Title: Apache XML-RPC: Multiple Vulnerabilities
Synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Apache XML-RPC, the worst of which could result in arbitrary code execution.

Background.Text: Apache XML-RPC (previously known as Helma XML-RPC) is a Java implementation of XML-RPC, a popular protocol that uses XML over HTTP to implement remote procedure calls.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Apache XML-RPC. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: Gentoo has discontinued support for Apache XML-RPC. We recommend that users unmerge it:
